closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the Drawer dialog or not.
closable.description_zh: 是否显示右上角的关闭按钮

destroyOnClose.description: Whether to unmount child components on closing drawer or not.
destroyOnClose.description_zh: 关闭时销毁 Drawer 里的子元素

getContainer.description: Return the mounted node for Drawer.
getContainer.description_zh: 指定 Drawer 挂载的 HTML 节点

maskClosable.description: Clicking on the mask (area outside the Drawer) to close the Drawer or not.
maskClosable.description_zh: 点击蒙层是否允许关闭

mask.description: Whether to show mask or not.

visible.description: Whether the Drawer dialog is visible or not.

wrapClassName.description: The class name of the container of the Drawer dialog.
wrapClassName.description_zh: 对话框外层容器的类名

:wrapStyle.description: Style of wrapper element which contains mask compare to drawerStyle
:wrapStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 最外层容器的样式，和 drawerStyle 的区别是作用节点包括 mask

:drawerStyle.description: Style of the popup layer element
:drawerStyle.description_zh: 用于设置 Drawer 弹出层的样式

:headerStyle.description: Style of the drawer header part
:headerStyle.description_zh: 用于设置 Drawer 头部的样式

:bodyStyle.description: Style of the drawer content part
:bodyStyle.description_zh: 可用于设置 Drawer 内容部分的样式

height.description: placement is top or bottom, height of the Drawer dialog.
height.description_zh: 高度, 在 placement 为 top 或 bottom 时使用

handle.description: After setting, the drawer is directly mounted on the DOM, and you can control the drawer to open or close through this handle.
handle.description_zh: 设置后抽屉直接挂载到 DOM 上，你可以通过该 handle 控制抽屉打开关闭

:afterVisibleChange.description: Callback after the animation ends when switching drawers.
:afterVisibleChange.description_zh: 切换抽屉时动画结束后的回调

keyboard.description: Whether support press esc to close
keyboard.description_zh: 是否支持键盘 esc 关闭

methods.name: close
methods.description: Specify a callback that will be called when a user clicks mask, close button or Cancel button.
methods.description_zh: 点击遮罩层或右上角叉或取消按钮的回调
